sen.j: 錦鶏間祗候（きんけいのましこう）は、大日本帝国憲法下の宮中に於ける資格の一。
sen.e: Kinkei no ma shiko is one of the licenses of the Imperial Court defined under the Constitution of the Empire of Japan.
Kinkei no ma shiko is one of the licenses of the Imperial Court defined under the Constitution of the Empire of Japan.
Kinkei no ma shiko is one of the licenses of the Imperial Court defined under the Constitution of the Empire of Japan.

sen.j: 華族や官吏で功労があった者を優遇するのが目的。
sen.e: The purpose of this license was to treat the peerage and government officials for their distinguished services and contributions.
The purpose of this license was to treat the peerage and government officials for their distinguished services and contributions.
The purpose of this license was to treat the peerage and government officials for their distinguished services and contributions.

sen.j: 麝香間祗候の次に位置する。
sen.e: This license was ranked next to Jako no ma shiko.
This license was ranked next to Jako no ma shiko.
This license was ranked next to Jako no ma shiko.

sen.j: 江戸時代の朝廷内にあった伺候衆の流れを汲む。
sen.e: This license followed shiko shu license system of the Imperial Court during Edo period.
This license followed shiko shu license system of the Imperial Court during Edo period.
This license followed shiko shu license system of the Imperial Court during Edo period.

sen.j: 勅任官待遇(宮中席次第26位)。
sen.e: A person given this license was treated as the imperial appointee (the 26th class standing within the Imperial Court).
A person given this license was treated as the imperial appointee (the 26th class standing within the Imperial Court).
A person given this license was treated as the imperial appointee (the 26th class standing within the Imperial Court).

sen.j: 実際の運用にあたっては5年以上勅任官の職にあった者から選ばれる。
sen.e: For the practice of issuing this license, the licensee was selected among the imperial appointees who had been in the position for more than 5 years.
For the practice of issuing this license, the licensee was selected among the imperial appointees who had been in the position for more than 5 years.
For the practice of issuing this license, the licensee was selected among the imperial appointees who had been in the position for more than 5 years.

sen.j: 錦鶏間とは本来は京都御所内の部屋の一つ、御学問之間のこと。
sen.e: Kinkei no ma is Gogakumon no ma (the study room) of Kyoto Imperial Palace.
Kinkei no ma was originally one of the rooms of Kyoto Imperial Palace, Gogakumon no ma (the study room).
sen.cmt: 「本来は」が訳されていません。
sen.e: Kinkei no ma was originally one of the rooms of Kyoto Imperial Palace, Gogakumon no ma (the study room).
